subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets exercised their $12 million option on Carlos Delgado on Friday. Given that the Mets were already committed to giving him a $4 million buyout had they not picked up his option, paying Delgado an extra $8 million could be a bargain if he can come close to duplicating his second-half surge.
